name: Monstergroup Combo Patch
description: MODIFIED by Malkeus: Consolidates and attempts to balance the monstergroups of Add Bandits, PKs_Rebalancing, Cataclysm++, Dinomod, Nechronica, DracoDogMod, Salvaged Robots, Vampire Stuff, Pora's Compilation and Jury Rigged Robots. Compiled for ease of editing. Overrides all monstergroups above it, additional mods which alter or add monstergroups should be loaded below this mod.  Confirmed functional for use with build 8166.
